# URL.FormatStyle.Component

**Enumeration**

An enumeration of the components of a URL, for use in creating format style options that depend on a component’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Component
```

## Overview

You use this type with style-modifying methods like [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL/FormatStyle/ComponentDisplayOption/displayWhen(_:matches:)] in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL/FormatStyle/ComponentDisplayOption] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL/FormatStyle/HostDisplayOption/omitWhen(_:matches:)] in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL/FormatStyle/HostDisplayOption].

## URL format style components

- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.scheme**: The URL format style scheme component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.host**: The URL format style host component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.port**: The URL format style port component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.user**: The URL format style user component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.password**: The URL format style password component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.path**: The URL format style path component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.query**: The URL format style query component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.fragment**: The URL format style fragment component.

## Display options

- **always**: A display option that always displays the component.
- **never**: A display option that never displays the component.
- **omitIfHTTPFamily**: A display option that omits the component if the URL scheme is any flavor of HTTP.
- **displayWhen(_:matches:)**: Returns a display option that displays the component when a specified component meets the specified requirements.
- **omitWhen(_:matches:)**: Returns a display option that omits the component when a specified component meets the specified requirements.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
